channel.title: Is there any way i can make it so an object like a door wont openif some1 clicks
channel.description: i need to know if i can make it so if some1 clicks on a door it wont open cause im tryin to make a staff zone

item.source: Is there any way i can make it so an object like a door wont openif some1 clicks

item.title: Is there any way i can make it so an object like a door wont openif some1 clicks
item.dc:creator: @_Rune_Realm ~Rune Realm
item.description:
@_Rune_Realm wrote:

In packet 132 (case 132 in the packetParsing method) add somthing similar to

switch(ObjectID) { case 0: case 1: if(playerRights => 1) { //Open Door } else { sendMessage("This area can only be accessed by staff."); } break; }

That means object ID 0 and 1 (Not that they’re door IDs or anything) can only be opened by Staff.
Where there is a commented line, change it to whatever implementation makes a door open.

Read full topic
